install.name: AutoTweet NG Automator-Plugin
install.author: Ulli Storck
install.description: AutoTweed NG Automator makes automatic post attempts for pending twitter messages (stored in the AutoTweet NG Component database). Needs AutoTweet NG Component to work.

param.name: max_posts
param.label: Max. nr of posts
param.description: Max. number of pending posts sendet by the Automator-Plugin in one time/call. (Max. 5 posts for performance reasons.)

param.name: interval
param.label: Interval in seconds
param.description: Interval for the post attempts of the Automator-Plugin. This means the plugin checks all X seconds for new pending posts. Min. is 120 seconds for performance reasons.
